overview: Documentary about the 1914-1918 Assyrian Genocide ("Seyfo" - sword), in which up to 250,000 people, or half of the Syriac Christian population, were killed, and thousands displaced. Archival footage is combined with interviews of survivors living in the Swedish diaspora.
tagline: The Cry Unheard - Genocide of the Assyrian People
title: The Cry Unheard
